title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: John Twachtman Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Historic Artwork     Weir Period (1882 - 1919)     John Twachtman Gallery                  Artwork - John Henry Twachtman                    John Henry Twachtman Artwork   4 Photos  Branchville inspired artwork by John Henry Twachtman in the mediums of pastel, etchings, and oil.
